name: Resonance Unlimited
description:
Resonance Unlimited is a twitch reaction music game. Chase Lumiere as she moves to the beat of the music! Follow her path with your finger and get to her before time runs out!
• Fast and intense arcade style action that's synced to the music!
• Featuring an amazing chiptune soundtrack by coda, Shirobon, Theory of N, Zantilla, and A.C. Phillips
• Global all-time and daily leaderboards to test your skills against players around the world

-----

If you like the music in the game you can also support the musicians directly through their Bandcamp pages! Check out the links below where you can find the music used in the Resonance Unlimited soundtrack, as well as some other awesome chiptune albums:

Theory of N - Buttdawg Funk
https://chiptuneswin.bandcamp.com/album/chiptunes-win-volume-1
https://theoryofn.bandcamp.com/

Zantilla - King Kombo
https://chiptuneswin.bandcamp.com/album/chiptunes-win-volume-2-2
https://zantilla.bandcamp.com/

coda - Dorito Dust
http://bc.s3m.us/
https://soundcloud.com/coda/dorito-dust

Shirobon - This Love
https://shirobon.bandcamp.com/album/infinity

A.C. Phillips - Frequency Factory & Resonance of Hearts
https://tresordif.bandcamp.com/
